This is Proudly a Open Source Software\nWe would love to hear the suggestions and Pull Request\nGithub : https://github.com/arkhania/E-tracer.git
Why do we need Alumni app?

Our social media including Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, Whatsapp when integrated together are not that capable to connect all the people of same place altogether. Thereby we needed a platform where we can again tie up all the people of any institution from base to brim. Alumni application is the best solution for this. This application will help you to open the door to get the updates about the alumni and get there guidance for various causes.

We need to know our alumni, we should know each other. This app is a crossroad of Alumni. It invites people to stretch the limits of their social circles and enhance their thinking with a diversity of new ideas and perspectives. It provides a welcoming space for viewpoints to collide in unexpected ways, and for creative sparks to fly. We need a community with these features.

Alumni is a former student of an institution, who is an ace experience holder and well laid. Having the lore of their experience can be the most useful aid anyone can have. Interacting with them can give us an image about the present scenario and can help us to grow with the requirements of the ongoing world. This can help us providing a good opportunity using the alumniâ€™s reference or having known their proficiency.
This is the answer to 3 FAQ
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.ask \n Get the alumni app and be a part of awesome community
